attributes.action: Propose a bill in parliament to create a threshold to make a petition binding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Each and every citizen of this country has the right to voice their opinion on how the United Kingdom should be governed.

If a majority of the population, defined as 50% of peoples domiciled in the United Kingdom at the last official UK government sanctioned census plus one person- should sign a petition such as this one, then the Government should make it a priority to be enforced and legislated upon if needs be.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
